trans-unit.source: Gets information about the specified certificate.
trans-unit.target: Gets information about the specified certificate.

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="0e07b9cb-8fdf-4ff7-b707-e964200df0f8" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to certificates.

trans-unit.source: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate for which you want to get information.
trans-unit.target: Replace {certificate-thumbprint} with the thumbprint of the certificate for which you want to get information.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="e9da2d54-053a-4392-a5ba-26229c7cc9a5" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: The X.509 thumbprint of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: The X.509 thumbprint of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: This is a sequence of up to 40 hex digits.
trans-unit.target: This is a sequence of up to 40 hex digits.

trans-unit.source: The algorithm used to derive the thumbprint.
trans-unit.target: The algorithm used to derive the thumbprint.

trans-unit.source: The current state of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: The current state of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>active</languageKeyword> - The certificate is available for use in pools.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>active</languageKeyword> - The certificate is available for use in pools.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>deleting</languageKeyword> - The user has requested that the certificate be deleted, but the delete operation has not yet completed.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>deleting</languageKeyword> - The user has requested that the certificate be deleted, but the delete operation has not yet completed.

trans-unit.source: You may not reference the certificate when creating or updating pools.
trans-unit.target: You may not reference the certificate when creating or updating pools.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>deletefailed</languageKeyword> - The user requested that the certificate be deleted, but there are pools that still have references to the certificate, or it is still installed on one or more compute nodes.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>deletefailed</languageKeyword> - The user requested that the certificate be deleted, but there are pools that still have references to the certificate, or it is still installed on one or more compute nodes.

trans-unit.source: (The latter can occur if the certificate has been removed from the pool, but the node has not yet restarted.
trans-unit.target: (The latter can occur if the certificate has been removed from the pool, but the node has not yet restarted.

trans-unit.source: Nodes refresh their certificates only when they restart.)
trans-unit.target: Nodes refresh their certificates only when they restart.)

trans-unit.source: You may use <link xlink:href="1f82d18e-e76e-49b6-aab1-4c2818c954a7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cancel the deletion of a certificate</link> to return the certificate to the active state, or <link xlink:href="387f5a38-41da-40aa-8a05-148bd0756e37" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete a certificate from an account</link> to retry the deletion.
trans-unit.target: You may use <link xlink:href="1f82d18e-e76e-49b6-aab1-4c2818c954a7" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Cancel the deletion of a certificate</link> to return the certificate to the active state, or <link xlink:href="387f5a38-41da-40aa-8a05-148bd0756e37" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Delete a certificate from an account</link> to retry the deletion.

trans-unit.source: The time at which the certificate entered the current state.
trans-unit.target: The time at which the certificate entered the current state.

trans-unit.source: The previous state of the certificate.
trans-unit.target: The previous state of the certificate.

trans-unit.source: This property is not present if the certificate is in its initial active state.
trans-unit.target: This property is not present if the certificate is in its initial active state.

trans-unit.source: This element is only returned if the status of the certificate has changed and the value contains the time in which the certificate entered the previous state.
trans-unit.target: This element is only returned if the status of the certificate has changed and the value contains the time in which the certificate entered the previous state.

trans-unit.source: The public part of the certificate as a base-64 encoded .cer file.
trans-unit.target: The public part of the certificate as a base-64 encoded .cer file.

trans-unit.source: The error that occurred on the last attempt to delete this certificate.
trans-unit.target: The error that occurred on the last attempt to delete this certificate.

trans-unit.source: This property is present only if the certificate is in the deletefailed state.
trans-unit.target: This property is present only if the certificate is in the deletefailed state.

trans-unit.source: An identifier for the certificate deletion error.
trans-unit.target: An identifier for the certificate deletion error.

trans-unit.source: Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: Codes are invariant and are intended to be consumed programmatically.

trans-unit.source: A message describing the certificate deletion error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.
trans-unit.target: A message describing the certificate deletion error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

trans-unit.source: A list of additional error details related to the certificate deletion error.
trans-unit.target: A list of additional error details related to the certificate deletion error.

trans-unit.source: This list includes details such as the active pools and nodes referencing this certificate.
trans-unit.target: This list includes details such as the active pools and nodes referencing this certificate.

trans-unit.source: However, if a large number of resources reference the certificate, the list contains only about the first hundred.
trans-unit.target: However, if a large number of resources reference the certificate, the list contains only about the first hundred.
